entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023
